block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: YL-83 - => A0 = 3.3V - <200K => A0 = 2.8-3.0V - 10K~20K => A0 = 1.7-2.2V Rain Sensor YL-83 - when dry resistance is infinity => A0 = 3.3V - wet slightly wet, resistance drop to <200K => A0 = 2.8-3.0V - wet very wet, resistance drop to 10K~20K => A0 = 1.7-2.2V
YL-83 VCC - 3.3V 5V GND - GND D0 - A0 - Connection for Rain Sensor YL-83 VCC - 3.3V or 5V GND - GND D0 - digital output A0 - analog output
OLED SSD1306 detect rain and display voltage on OLED SSD 1306
YL-83 A0 retrieve analog output, A0, from rain sensor YL-83

D0 2 PCB DO-LEDDO-LEDDO-LED "DO-LED""DO-LED" To set the the digital output, D0, just leave several drops of water on the sensor to bridge several gaps between the 2 PCB track patterns, to simulate the effect of rain. Then slowly turn the variable resistor until the "DO-LED" just turn ON. If the "DO-LED" is already ON, then turn until it is OFF first, and then change direction and turn slowly until "DO-LED" is now. To verify the settings, remove some of the water on the sensor, and the "DO-LED" should be OFF. Add back some water, and "DO-LED" should be ON
